name: DITE Solutions
tag_list: bookkeeping, financial-accounting, cloud-based-bookkeeping, business-research, business-plans, business-counsulting, xero, saasu, wave, quickbooks, kashoo, forex-trading
overview:
DITE Solutions is a Sri Lanka based BPO/KPO organization, run by experienced & innovative individuals/freelancers who have extensive knowledge in various fields such as finance, accounting, auditing, e-commerce, marketing, information technology, venture capital, business researches and other core business areas.

With so many business activities to perform, you may not be able to focus on the growth and may lacking in knowledge or funds to fulfill all these essential business activities internally. DITE’s main focus is to deliver an impeccable set of solutions, which will guarantee the growth and the success of your organization.
